mapper.insert: insert into credit_packs (credit_pack_sid, code, name, description, amount, display_price, stripe_price_id, enabled, sort_order, created_at) values (#{creditPackSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{displayPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stripePriceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sortOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update credit_packs set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, display_price = #{displayPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stripe_price_id = #{stripePriceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where credit_pack_sid = #{creditPackSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select credit_pack_sid, code, name, description, amount, display_price, stripe_price_id, enabled, sort_order, created_at from credit_packs where credit_pack_sid = #{creditPackSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select credit_pack_sid, code, name, description, amount, display_price, stripe_price_id, enabled, sort_order, created_at from credit_packs
